issue.title: [CI] Fast finish failing AppVeyor builds
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2533](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2533). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The main AppVeyor queue is taking very long to schedule jobs, one of the measures to get it better would be to immediately fail a job once a build is broken.
